description.rawText: Title: Business Analyst/ Data Analyst Location: Alpharetta,  GA Duration: 7 Months Primary job function:    Individual acts as liaison between the business and information systems,  and participates in the development of new system(s) and enhancements of existing system(s) to support business processes.   Conducts routine maintenance to existing systems to support business processes.   Develops and build databases and reporting tools for use in analyzing sales activity,  contract activity,  trend reports and compliance.     Job responsibilities:    Responsible for compliance with applicable Corporate and Divisional Policies and procedures.   Ability to work in team-oriented environment and working with cross-functional teams  Ability to work in a time-sensitive environment and effectively prioritize multiple tasks to meet stringent deadlines is essential as well as attention to detail.     Position accountability / scope:    Troubleshoots and resolves help desk tickets submitted by sales and pricing analysts for existing systems.   Serve as a subject matter expert and technical resource for sales and pricing analysts.     Basic Qualifications:    Bachelor's degree plus 6+ years of related work experience with a strong understanding of specified functional area,  or an equivalent combination of education and work experience.   Advanced MS Access 2010 (relational database solutions,  queries,  macros,  VBA programming) and MS Excel 2010 (macros,  power pivot,  power query,  graphing/charting,  automation,  formulas,  and forms) skills.   Cognos and SAP experience is a plus.

companyDescription.rawText: SPECTRAFORCE TECHNOLOGIES INC (www. spectraforce. com) offers a powerful suite of IT and Consulting services allowing companies to embrace the challenges of meeting and exceeding the company's IT needs with an aggressive Total Cost of Ownership.  We enable companies to focus on their core competencies,  while we handle the integral details of building IT solution guaranteeing quality delivery with significant cost savings.  We offer a competitive edge through our Staff Augmentation Services (PrimuSourcing) and Projects Outsourcing  Services,  which are pwered by our Global Delivery Model with teams based onsite in the US and offshore in India.
